text: [Music]
hi my name is Jennifer marsman and I
just finished a talk involving this
crazy headset on my head this is a
headset that reads EEG or your brain
waves and it's made by a company called
emotive and so I took this headset and I
put it on my husband and I asked him a
series of questions and first I had him
tell me the truth and then I asked him
to lie to me and what that gave me is a
labeled data set of what his brain waves
look like when he's telling the truth
and what they look like when he's lying
and so I took that data and fed it into
a machine learning algorithm to build a
classifier to perform lie detection so
for great content like this and other
really fun talks come join us at NDC in
locations all over the world London Oslo
Sydney and others it's so much fun
you'll meet some amazing people learn
some really incredible technology and
have a great time join us
[Music]
